    GuestListManipulator
    Allows changes to be made to the Reservation object Adds the specified entry from the parameter into the Reservation, followed by traversing array of guest in reservation and adding them to Hotel Guest List.
    Hotel
    Creates and display menu which allows the selection of RoomType # RoomType The menu of RoomType is as follows {(RoomType-Index): Single-0, Double-1, Deluxe-2, VIP-3}.
    Refresher
    Updates availability status and room service order status of reserved or occupied rooms automatically;
    ReservationListManipulator
    Allows changes to be made to the Reservation object by the use of addEntry method and removeEntry method, as well as getEntry method.

    RoomStatusReport
